description:
20/02264/FUL RE-CONSULTATION FOLLOWING RECEIPT OF REVISED/UPDATED DRAWINGS AND DOCUMENTATION

The construction of a part 5, part 7 and part 9 storey mixed-use development comprising a circa 1,646sqm community use/health centre (use class E) and age restricted residential accommodation being 75 one and two bed apartments (use class C3), with associated parking (9 car parking spaces and cycle parking), public realm improvements and landscaping.

(This application affects the setting of Listed Buildings and East Ham Town Centre Conservation Area)
